overview:
A partner at Alpha Force Ventures who invests technology into business-end entrepreneurs.

Ali Hamed was the founder of YourEasyNews.com and a co-founder of Memsparx Inc.

He has also done consulting for numerous companies across the globe and is an advisor to an incubator called iHills based in Rwanda.

At Alpha Force Ventures Ali sources deals and invests technology into well developed business plans or high potential entrepreneurs. Alpha Force will build an MVP or alpha product for these entrepreneurs for equity to help them eliminate technical risk, build market validity, acquire traction, and begin taking steps to raise seed stage or series A round funding.
